The far right has replaced the old left as Russia's propaganda tool  —  During the 20th century, the American Communist Party and left-leaning journalists acted as conduits for the Soviet Union's propaganda.  At no time was this clearer than in August 1939, when the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany signed a non-aggression pact.
